title: 12-year-old girl stabbed & left for dead by 'Besties'
itunes:title: 12-year-old girl stabbed & left for dead by 'Besties'
description:
Two girls stab their best friend 19 times. Why? They wanted to appease the fictional horror character, Slender Man. Both girls are serving time in a mental health facility. After an attorney files an appeal, there's a chance both girls could walk free.

Joining Nancy Grace to discuss the case:

  • Ashley Wilcott - Judge and trial attorney 
  • Jeff Cortese - Former Special Agent FBI 
  • Dr. Bethany Marshall- Psychoanalyst 
  • Karen Smith- Forensic Expert of Bare Bones Consulting 
  • Levi Page- CrimeOnline reporter 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
